# Brig
## Overview
**Brig:** These two-masted, square-rigged ships are employed as fast merchant vessels, but are also often armed as corsairs or privateers. Theyâ€™re lighter than frigates, but able to carry a comparable armament. Brigs flying pirate flags are the scourge of the Inner Sea.

**Source:** Ships of the Inner Sea (Paizo), pg. 5
